title: WinML or DirectML support planned?
body_html:
As Windows support seems coming in 0.4 I would like to request WinML and or DirectML support.. it’s Windows only API, but this should support AMD and Intel GPUs using D3D12 backend or even DirectML which with custom metacommands seems even able to use tensor cores on Volta GPUs..
Hope to hear news at least by Build conference in May

body:
As Windows support seems coming in 0.4 I would like to request WinML and or DirectML support.. it’s Windows only API, but this should support AMD and Intel GPUs using D3D12 backend or even DirectML which with custom metacommands seems even able to use tensor cores on Volta GPUs..
Hope to hear news at least by Build conference in May
